commit.message: Review comments fixed: UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo changed to LookAndFeelInfo
Review comments fixed: UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo changed to LookAndFeelInfo and static imported LookAndFeelInfo
Fixed review comments: Updated test summary, updated code comments, updated exception message

Review comments fixed: A CountDownLatch used instead of polling loop, hitKeys() introduced for key press/release, variable MENU changed to FILE_MENU, formatting changes, frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE)
Wait until focus is on list, changed the mnemonics for opening menu, added menulistener, caught UnsupportedLookAndFeelException and ignore LnF
8281988: Create a regression test for JDK-4618767
